Description:

After making their way through high school, big changes are in store for officers Schmidt and Jenko when they go deep undercover at a local college. But when Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team, and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art major scene, they begin to question their partnership.

Directors: Phil Lord, Christopher Miller

Stars: Channing Tatum, Jonah Hill, Ice Cube

Release: 2014 / 22 Jump Street
